nodes.text: Nahdar Vebb's Lightsaber was the lightsaber wielded by the Mon Calamari Jedi Knight Nahdar Vebb during the galaxy-wide conflict dubbed the Clone Wars.
Vebb wielded it when he traveled to third moon of Vassek to re-capture Nute Gunray along with his former master Kit Fisto.

After he was killed by Grievous, the cyborg general claimed the lightsaber of the fallen Jedi, and in a duel with Master Fisto, he lost the lightsaber when the Nautolan recovered it and took it back to the Jedi Temple.
